title: Travis Scott calls his daughter Stormi his 'battery'
text:
Just last week it was announced that Travis Scott and his 'wifey' Kyle Jenner had split up.

But that doesn't mean that the two are going to skip corners when it comes to parenting their one-year-old daughter, Stormi.

The rapper recently opened up about his experience with fatherhood calling his delightful daughter 'a battery.'

'I've gotten so much energy from her,' the 28-year-old told GQ Germany in a new interview.

Opening up: Travis Scott is opening up about his one-year-old daughter Stormi calling her a 'battery' and how she has changed him as a man

Co-parent: Just last week it was announced that Travis Scott and his 'wifey' Kyle Jenner had split up. But that doesn't mean that the two are going to skip corners when it comes to parenting their one-year-old daughter, Stormi

'She has shown me so many things that I never understood. I only got it once she was here,' he continued in his interview before saying: 'Fatherhood is the most impactful thing in my life.'

'To see your daughter getting a little older every day is the most magical experience in the world,' the Grammy nominated artist revealed.

'I've also developed so much passion. I feel things I never felt before.'

Adorable: 'She has shown me so many things that I never understood. I only got it once she was here,' he continued in his interview before saying: 'Fatherhood is the most impactful thing in my life'

Earlier this year, he paid a sweet tribute to his little girl by sharing a birthday tribute to his first born.

'ITS MY QUEEN ,MY HEART, MY AIR , MY EVERYTHING. STORMI'S BIRTHDAY TODAY. I LOVE U SO MUCH BABY,' Scott wrote.

'UR SPIRT KEEPS ME GOING EVERY DAY ME AND UR MOMMY LOVE U AND CANT WAIT TO SHARE MORE BEAUTIFUL DAYS WITH U. HAPPY BDAYY STORMIII LETS RAGE.'

Little one: Travis shared this sweet photo of his daughter over the summer while riding a pony

While Travis and Kylie have kept quiet since their breakup with Kylie taking to Twitter just once to clear the air on a rumor writing: 'Our main focus right now is Stormi. Our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

Just after their breakup, the makeup mogul took to her Instagram to share a few clips of their daughter getting a new playground set as the little one sported her dad's shirt.

Stormi also rocked a pair of Jordan 1 Retro High Travis Scotts as she climbed onto her new play set.

Former flames: Kylie and Travis stepped out for a New Year's Eve dinner out in West Hollywood back in 2018

Self care: On Friday, Kylie decided to step back from her crazy couple of weeks and treat herself to a laser facial
description: The rapper recently opened up about his experience with fatherhood calling his delightful daughter 'a battery' and adding 'I've gotten so much energy from her'.
